name: Space Death
description:
Space Death - A short experimental game in which you assume the role of Death and have to kill some people at a club. But there is a twist: you are in space.
This is the first game of my "One Game a Week" project, and deals with some experimental gameplay and storytelling, with a little hint of social commentary.

Be free to take your own conclusion on what this game is supposed to mean and have fun bumping on people after you have eliminated the five characters.

Instructions: Use the mouse to rotate the character and the left mouse button to accelerate.

Features:

  • Kill people in space.
  • Play as Death.
  • Listen to some cool Hip-Hop music
  • Have fun playing with the physics

Be sure to follow me on twitter @OPC_Eadow to know when more games come out. twitter.com/OPC_Eadow
